name: get_nft_owner
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uniblock.
Tool description: Unified Blockchain API, use one, use them all. 

 

From NFTs, DeFi, Wallets, GameFi, Tokens, or simply launching contracts, we've got tools to help build them both easier and faster.

Uniblockis a suite of blockchain tooling to support developers in building any blockchain project.
API description: Fetches the owner of a specific ERC-721 NFT using the provided chain ID, NFT contract address, and NFT ID.

chainid.description: The chain ID of the blockchain network on which the NFT resides.

nftaddress.description: Enter the address of the NFT contract.

nftid.description: Enter the NFT ID of the specific NFT to query.
